name: Web Lógica
description: Web Logic is an interactive agency founded in 1999 , which was born primarily by the need for quality web services in the Southeast region . Currently, our work philosophy is based on 3 main concepts: Technology, Creativity and Strategy . We have not seen the Internet pass, but we have evolved along with it, adopting the new trends and using only the best practices.

locations.address: Calle 17 number 661 x 62 and 68 Jardines de Mérida
